<script id="widget-template-exitintent" type="text/html">
  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="//cdn.retailrocket.ru/api/1.0/partner/<%=partnerId%>/item/<%=ItemId%>/picture/?format=png&width=<%=itemImageWidth%>&height=<%=itemImageHeight%>&scale=both" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>

.retailrocket-w[data-s="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"] .rr-swiper-wrapper{position:relative;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:1;display:-webkit-box;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:-webkit-flex;display:flex;-webkit-transition-property:-webkit-transform;-moz-transition-property:-moz-transform;-o-transition-property:-o-transform;-ms-transition-property:-ms-transform;transition-property:transform;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;-moz-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box;-webkit-box-lines:multiple;-moz-box-lines:multiple;-ms-flex-wrap:wrap}

<script id="widget-template-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" type="text/html">
<div class="retailrocket-items-container rr-swiper-container">
  <div class="retailrocket-items rr-swiper-wrapper">
    <% for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) { %>
    <div class="retailrocket-item rr-swiper-slide">
	  <div class="retailrocket-item__wrapper">
          <a class="retailrocket-item__info" href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
          	<div class="retailrocket-item__name">
              <span><%=Name.substr(0,33)+('...') %></span>
            </div>
            <div class="retailrocket-item__image">
              <img src="https://cdn.retailrocket.net/api/1.0/partner/<%=partnerId%>/item/<%=ItemId%>/picture/?format=png&width=<%=itemImageWidth%>&height=<%=itemImageHeight%>&scale=both" onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)">
        	</div>
            <div class="retailrocket-item__price-block">
              <% if (OldPrice > Price) { %>
                <div class="retailrocket-item__price with-old-price">
                  <div class="item-price"> <span class="item-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                  <div class="item-old-price"> <span class="item-old-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(OldPrice, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                </div>
              <% } else { %>
                <div class="retailrocket-item__price without-old-price">
                  <div class="item-price"> <span class="item-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                </div>
              <% } %>
            </div>
  		  </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    <% } %>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="rr-slider-arrow">
 <a class="rr-arrow swiper-prev"></a>
 <a class="rr-arrow swiper-next"></a>
</div>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function (retailrocket) {
  'use strict';

  var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
    var checkCount = 100;
    var timeout = 1000;

    (function check() {
      var result = exitCondition();
      if (result) {
        callback(result);
        return;
      }

      if (checkCount === 0) {
        if (force) {
          callback();
        }
        return;
      }

      checkCount -= 1;
      setTimeout(check, timeout);
    }());
  };
  
  if (!('duplicates' in retailrocket.modules)) {
    retailrocket.setModule('duplicates', [], function () {
      var savedIds = [];
      var paramName = 'GroupId';

      function has(id) {
        return (savedIds.indexOf(id) !== -1);
      }

      function add(id) {
        savedIds = savedIds.concat(id);
      }

      function remove(id) {
        var ids = [].concat(id);

        savedIds = savedIds.filter(function (savedId) {
          return ids.indexOf(savedId) === -1;
        });
      }

      function filter(recom) {
        if (!recom[paramName]) {
          return true;
        }

        if (!has(recom[paramName])) {
          add(recom[paramName]);
          return true;
        }

        return false;
      }

      function filteredCount(recoms) {
        return recoms.reduce(function (acc, recom) {
          return (acc + (has(recom[paramName]) ? 1 : 0));
        }, 0);
      }

      function getItems() {
        return savedIds.slice();
      }

      return {
        has: has,
        add: add,
        remove: remove,
        filter: filter,
        filteredCount: filteredCount,
        getItems: getItems,
      };
    });
  }
  
  function preRenderUpdateProducts(recoms, render) {
    var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
    var idsReco = [];
    var msgNew = {};
    var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
    var newPrices = [];

    recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
      recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
      idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
    });

    idsReco = idsReco.join(',');

    var rrRecomsPost = {
      rr_products: idsReco, 
      rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
    }

    waitFor(
      function() {
        return ('jQuery' in window);
      },
      function() {
        $ = window.jQuery;

        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });

            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            render(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
    );
  }

  retailrocket['imperiatechno5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16'] = (function () {
    var widgetParent = document.querySelector('div[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]');
    var navs = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__nav');
    var widgetWrappers = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__content');
    var popUp = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
    var closeButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-close-button');
    var toggleButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup__open-button a');
    var timerWrapper = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer-block');
    var timer = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer');
    
    function preRenderFnPersonal(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {        
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      } else {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forCategories(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [0],
          "popular",
          {},
          function (recommendation) {
            renderFn(recommendation.slice(0, 12));
          }
        );
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnFilter(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnViewed(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      if (recoms.length > 0) {
        renderFn(recoms);
      } else {
        widget.innerHTML = '<div class="rr-note">Просмотренных товаров пока нет.</div>';
      }
    }
    
    function openWidget(button) {
      var widgetBlock = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
      
      widgetBlock.classList.toggle('active');
      button.closest('.retailrocket-popup__open-button').classList.toggle('active');
    }
    
    function widgetTabs(evt, tabName) {
      var blockTitle = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup-window__title-text');

      widgetWrappers.forEach(function (tabContentEl) {
        tabContentEl.classList.remove('active');
      });

      navs.forEach(function (nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');
      });

      widgetParent.querySelector(tabName).classList.add('active');
      evt.currentTarget.classList.add('active');
      blockTitle.innerHTML = evt.currentTarget.querySelector('.title').innerHTML;

      if (tabName == '.retailrocket-tab__content.rr-saleByPopular') {
        timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        timerWrapper.classList.remove('active');
      }
    }

    function calculateDate() {
      var dateEnd = new Date();
	  dateEnd.setHours(23,59,59);
      var dateStart = new Date();
      var hoursUtc = dateStart.getUTCHours();
      var hoursMoscow = hoursUtc + 3;
      var calculatedDate = dateEnd - dateStart;
      var hours = Math.floor(calculatedDate/1000/60/60);
      var minutes = Math.floor((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)/1000/60);
      var seconds = Math.floor(((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)-minutes*60*1000)/1000);
      
      function convertTime(time){
        var digitTime = time >= 10 ? time : "0"+time.toString();
        return digitTime;
      }
      var concatedDate = convertTime(hours).toString() + ':' + convertTime(minutes).toString() + ':' + convertTime(seconds).toString();
      return concatedDate;
    }
    
    setInterval(function(){
      timer.textContent = calculateDate();
    },1000);
    

    function viewBlock(activeButton) {
      var targetWidget = activeButton.getAttribute('data-target');
      
      widgetWrappers.forEach(function(widgetWrapper) {
        if (widgetWrapper.classList.contains(targetWidget)) {
          widgetWrapper.classList.add('active');

          if (targetWidget == 'rr-saleByPopular') {
            timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
          }
        } else {
          widgetWrapper.classList.remove('active');
        }
      });
    }

    function postRenderFn(widget) {
      var showNav = 'rr-' + widget.getAttribute('data-algorithm');

      navs.forEach(function(nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');

        if (nav.classList.contains('rr-no-hidden') || nav.getAttribute('data-target') == showNav) {
          nav.classList.add('show');
        }
      });
      
      widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.show').classList.add('active');

      setTimeout(function() {
        viewBlock(widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.active'));
      }, 1);

      waitFor(
        function () {
          return window.jQuery;
        },
        function ($) {
          var $widget = $(widget);

          $.getScript('https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/swiper/3.4.2/js/swiper.min.js', function () {
            var imperiatechnoSwiper = new Swiper($widget.find('.rr-swiper-container'), {
              wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
              slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
              loop: false,
              slidesPerView: 3,
              slidesPerColumn: 2,
              slidesPerColumnFill: 'column',
              slidesPerGroup: 1,
              spaceBetween: 0,
              centeredSlides: false,
              nextButton: $widget.find('.swiper-next'),
              prevButton: $widget.find('.swiper-prev'),
              paginationClickable: false,
            });
          });
        }
      );
    }
    
    function сheckMobile() {
      var check = false;

      (function(a) {
        if (/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows ce|xda|xiino/i.test(a) || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4))) check = true;
      })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);

      return check;
    };
    var widget_mode = document.querySelectorAll('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]')[0];

    if (сheckMobile() == true) {
		widget_mode.style.display = 'none';
    }

    closeButton.onclick = function() {
      toggleButton.click();
    };

    popUp.onmouseup = function(e) {
      if (e.target.closest('.retailrocket-popup-window') === null) {
        toggleButton.click();
      }
    };

    return {
      postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
      preRenderFnPersonal: preRenderFnPersonal,
      preRenderFnFilter: preRenderFnFilter,
      preRenderFnViewed: preRenderFnViewed,
      openWidget: openWidget,
      widgetTabs: widgetTabs
    };
  }());
  
  retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16');

}(retailrocket));
</script></div><!-- Rating@Mail.ru counter -->

<script type="text/javascript">
var rrPartnerId = "5826348d9872e5b33c3f8983";
var rrApi = {};
var rrApiOnReady = rrApiOnReady || [];
rrApi.addToBasket = rrApi.order = rrApi.categoryView = rrApi.view =
rrApi.recomMouseDown = rrApi.recomAddToCart = function() {};
(function(d) {
var ref = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
var apiJs, apiJsId = 'rrApi-jssdk';
if (d.getElementById(apiJsId)) return;
apiJs = d.createElement('script');
apiJs.id = apiJsId;
apiJs.async = true;
apiJs.src = "//cdn.retailrocket.ru/content/javascript/tracking.js";
ref.parentNode.insertBefore(apiJs, ref);
}(document));
</script>

<script id="widget-template-exitintent" type="text/html">
  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="//cdn.retailrocket.ru/api/1.0/partner/<%=partnerId%>/item/<%=ItemId%>/picture/?format=png&width=<%=itemImageWidth%>&height=<%=itemImageHeight%>&scale=both" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>

.35s ease-in-out;-moz-transition:max-width .35s ease-in-out;-ms-transition:max-width .35s ease-in-out;-o-transition:max-width .35s ease-in-out;transition:max-width .35s ease-in-out;text-shadow:0 1px 0 <script id="widget-template-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" type="text/html">
<div class="retailrocket-items-container rr-swiper-container">
  <div class="retailrocket-items rr-swiper-wrapper">
    <% for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) { %>
    <div class="retailrocket-item rr-swiper-slide">

                </div>

                <div class="retailrocket-item__price without-old-price">

<script type="text/javascript">
(function (retailrocket) {
  'use strict';

  var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
    var checkCount = 100;
    var timeout = 1000;

    (function check() {
      var result = exitCondition();
      if (result) {
        callback(result);
        return;
      }

      if (checkCount === 0) {
        if (force) {
          callback();
        }
        return;
      }

      checkCount -= 1;
      setTimeout(check, timeout);
    }());
  };
  
  if (!('duplicates' in retailrocket.modules)) {
    retailrocket.setModule('duplicates', [], function () {
      var savedIds = [];
      var paramName = 'GroupId';

      function has(id) {
        return (savedIds.indexOf(id) !== -1);
      }

      function add(id) {
        savedIds = savedIds.concat(id);
      }

      function remove(id) {
        var ids = [].concat(id);

        savedIds = savedIds.filter(function (savedId) {
          return ids.indexOf(savedId) === -1;
        });
      }

      function filter(recom) {
        if (!recom[paramName]) {
          return true;
        }

        if (!has(recom[paramName])) {
          add(recom[paramName]);
          return true;
        }

        return false;
      }

      function filteredCount(recoms) {
        return recoms.reduce(function (acc, recom) {
          return (acc + (has(recom[paramName]) ? 1 : 0));
        }, 0);
      }

      function getItems() {
        return savedIds.slice();
      }

      return {
        has: has,
        add: add,
        remove: remove,
        filter: filter,
        filteredCount: filteredCount,
        getItems: getItems,
      };
    });
  }
  
  function preRenderUpdateProducts(recoms, render) {
    var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
    var idsReco = [];
    var msgNew = {};
    var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
    var newPrices = [];

    recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
      recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
      idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
    });

    idsReco = idsReco.join(',');

    var rrRecomsPost = {
      rr_products: idsReco, 
      rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
    }

    waitFor(
      function() {
        return ('jQuery' in window);
      },
      function() {
        $ = window.jQuery;

        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });

            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            render(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
    );
  }

  retailrocket['imperiatechno5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16'] = (function () {
    var widgetParent = document.querySelector('div[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]');
    var navs = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__nav');
    var widgetWrappers = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__content');
    var popUp = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
    var closeButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-close-button');
    var toggleButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup__open-button a');
    var timerWrapper = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer-block');
    var timer = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer');
    
    function preRenderFnPersonal(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {        
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      } else {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forCategories(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [0],
          "popular",
          {},
          function (recommendation) {
            renderFn(recommendation.slice(0, 12));
          }
        );
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnFilter(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnViewed(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      if (recoms.length > 0) {
        renderFn(recoms);
      } else {
        widget.innerHTML = '<div class="rr-note">Просмотренных товаров пока нет.</div>';
      }
    }
    
    function openWidget(button) {
      var widgetBlock = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
      
      widgetBlock.classList.toggle('active');
      button.closest('.retailrocket-popup__open-button').classList.toggle('active');
    }
    
    function widgetTabs(evt, tabName) {
      var blockTitle = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup-window__title-text');

      widgetWrappers.forEach(function (tabContentEl) {
        tabContentEl.classList.remove('active');
      });

      navs.forEach(function (nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');
      });

      widgetParent.querySelector(tabName).classList.add('active');
      evt.currentTarget.classList.add('active');
      blockTitle.innerHTML = evt.currentTarget.querySelector('.title').innerHTML;

      if (tabName == '.retailrocket-tab__content.rr-saleByPopular') {
        timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        timerWrapper.classList.remove('active');
      }
    }

    function calculateDate() {
      var dateEnd = new Date();
	  dateEnd.setHours(23,59,59);
      var dateStart = new Date();
      var hoursUtc = dateStart.getUTCHours();
      var hoursMoscow = hoursUtc + 3;
      var calculatedDate = dateEnd - dateStart;
      var hours = Math.floor(calculatedDate/1000/60/60);
      var minutes = Math.floor((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)/1000/60);
      var seconds = Math.floor(((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)-minutes*60*1000)/1000);
      
      function convertTime(time){
        var digitTime = time >= 10 ? time : "0"+time.toString();
        return digitTime;
      }
      var concatedDate = convertTime(hours).toString() + ':' + convertTime(minutes).toString() + ':' + convertTime(seconds).toString();
      return concatedDate;
    }
    
    setInterval(function(){
      timer.textContent = calculateDate();
    },1000);
    

    function viewBlock(activeButton) {
      var targetWidget = activeButton.getAttribute('data-target');
      
      widgetWrappers.forEach(function(widgetWrapper) {
        if (widgetWrapper.classList.contains(targetWidget)) {
          widgetWrapper.classList.add('active');

          if (targetWidget == 'rr-saleByPopular') {
            timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
          }
        } else {
          widgetWrapper.classList.remove('active');
        }
      });
    }

    function postRenderFn(widget) {
      var showNav = 'rr-' + widget.getAttribute('data-algorithm');

      navs.forEach(function(nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');

        if (nav.classList.contains('rr-no-hidden') || nav.getAttribute('data-target') == showNav) {
          nav.classList.add('show');
        }
      });
      
      widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.show').classList.add('active');

      setTimeout(function() {
        viewBlock(widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.active'));
      }, 1);

      waitFor(
        function () {
          return window.jQuery;
        },
        function ($) {
          var $widget = $(widget);

          $.getScript('https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/swiper/3.4.2/js/swiper.min.js', function () {
            var imperiatechnoSwiper = new Swiper($widget.find('.rr-swiper-container'), {
              wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
              slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
              loop: false,
              slidesPerView: 3,
              slidesPerColumn: 2,
              slidesPerColumnFill: 'column',
              slidesPerGroup: 1,
              spaceBetween: 0,
              centeredSlides: false,
              nextButton: $widget.find('.swiper-next'),
              prevButton: $widget.find('.swiper-prev'),
              paginationClickable: false,
            });
          });
        }
      );
    }
    
    function сheckMobile() {
      var check = false;

      (function(a) {
        if (/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows ce|xda|xiino/i.test(a) || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4))) check = true;
      })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);

      return check;
    };
    var widget_mode = document.querySelectorAll('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]')[0];

    if (сheckMobile() == true) {
		widget_mode.style.display = 'none';
    }

    closeButton.onclick = function() {
      toggleButton.click();
    };

    popUp.onmouseup = function(e) {
      if (e.target.closest('.retailrocket-popup-window') === null) {
        toggleButton.click();
      }
    };

    return {
      postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
      preRenderFnPersonal: preRenderFnPersonal,
      preRenderFnFilter: preRenderFnFilter,
      preRenderFnViewed: preRenderFnViewed,
      openWidget: openWidget,
      widgetTabs: widgetTabs
    };
  }());
  
  retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16');

}(retailrocket));

	<div id="top">
    	<div class="content">

                    <li class="ico4"><a href="/installation.html">Установка</a></li>

                </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="top_info">
           Интернет-магазин «Империя техно» приглашает Вас за покупками бытовой техники и электроники! В нашем магазине  Вы сможете приобрести холодильники, стиральные машины, посудомоечные машины, встраиваемую технику, телевизоры и всё, что необходимо для уютной обстановки у Вас в доме

<script id="widget-template-exitintent" type="text/html">
  <div class="retailrocket-container new_prod_wrapper">
    <header class="retailrocket-widgettitle">
      <span><%=(headerText)%></span>
    </header>
    <div class="swiper-container">
      <ul class="rr-items swiper-wrapper">
        <%
        for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) {
          var tobasket = {
            id: Params.id,
            artikul: ItemId,
            title: Name,
            url: Url,
            img: PictureUrl,
            count: 1,
            price: {
              price: retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, ".", "", 2),
              pp: 1,
              dl_1: 0,
              dl_2: 0,
              dl_o: 0
            },
          };
        %>
        <div class="item-wrapper swiper-slide">
            <li class="retailrocket-item">
              <div class="img"><a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
                <img  onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)" src="//cdn.retailrocket.ru/api/1.0/partner/<%=partnerId%>/item/<%=ItemId%>/picture/?format=png&width=<%=itemImageWidth%>&height=<%=itemImageHeight%>&scale=both" style="width:<%=itemImageWidth%>px;height:<%=itemImageHeight%>px"></a>
              </div>
              <div class="name">
                <a href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
					<%=Model%>
                </a>
              </div>
              <a href="<%=Url%>" class="price" onmousedown='retailrocket.widget.click(<%=ItemId%>,"<%=suggesterId%>","<%=algorithm%>") '><%= Price %> руб.</a>
            </li>
          </div>
        <% } %>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var retailrocketShowPopup = true;
    
    function waitFor(exitCondition, callback) {
      var checkCount = 10;
      var timeoutms = 1000;

      (function check() {
        if (exitCondition()) {
          callback();
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeoutms);
      })();
    }
    
    retailrocket.raybtExit = (function () {
      var successClass = '_success';
      var popupCloseTimeout = 3000;

      function onSubscribe(notifyWidget) {
        notifyWidget.classList.add(successClass);

        setTimeout(function () {
          notifyWidget.classList.remove(successClass);
        }, popupCloseTimeout);
      }
      
      function onCheckChange(form) {
        var sendButton = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-from-send-btn'];
        var emailInput = form.elements['storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email'];
        sendButton.disabled = !sendButton.disabled;
        emailInput.disabled = !emailInput.disabled;
      }

      function buy(button) {
        var $button = window.$(button);
        if ($button.closest('.retailrocket-exit-after').length === 0) {
          $button.clone().appendTo('.retailrocket-exit-after').click();
        }
      }
      
      function widgetPreRender(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
        var idsReco = [];
        var msgNew = {};
        var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
        var newPrices = [];
        if (widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type') == 'basket') {
           var cartButton = $('#storetrigger-mailrequest-from-basket-btn');
          cartButton = cartButton.css('display','block')
        }

        recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
          recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
          idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
        });

        idsReco = idsReco.join(',');
        var rrRecomsPost = {
          rr_products: idsReco, 
          rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
        }

        $ = window.jQuery;
        
        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });
            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            renderFn(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
      
      $('.retailrocket-subscribe-form').submit(function (e) {
        var mail = $(this).find('#storetrigger-mailrequest-form-email').val();
        var mailDATA = 'rr_email=' + mail;
        
        $.ajax({
          method: "POST",
          url: "https://www.imperiatechno.ru/admin/ajax/rr_collect_email.php", 
          data: mailDATA
        });
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      
      function widgetActive(widget) {
        var algoWidget = widget.getAttribute('data-rendered-list-type'),
            countItems = Number(widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items'));

        if (countItems > 0 && algoWidget == 'basket') {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'block'
        } else {
          widget.parentElement.style.display = 'none';
        }

        if (retailrocketShowPopup) {
          setTimeout(function(){
            retailrocketShowPopup = false;
            widget.parentNode.classList.remove('rr_none_widget');
          }, 500);
        }
      }

      return {
        buy: buy,
        onSubscribe: onSubscribe,
        onCheckChange: onCheckChange,
        widgetActive: widgetActive,
        widgetPreRender: widgetPreRender
      };
    }());
    
    if (screen.width < 1025) {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.close(true);
    } {
      retailrocket.exitIntendWidget.initialize();
      retailrocket.mailRequestForm.initialize();
      retailrocket.deactivateIfAgreedToReceiveMarketingMail.initialize();
      
      waitFor( 
        function () {
          return ('jQuery' in window);
        },
        function () {
          retailrocket.widget.render('retailrocket-widget-exitintent');
        }
      )
    }
  }(retailrocket));
</script>

.retailrocket-w[data-s="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"] .rr-arrow{position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%);width:16px;height:39px;display:block;transition:all ease .3s;cursor:pointer;border:none;font-size:0;background-position:center;background-repeat:no-repeat;z-index:1}

.retailrocket-w[data-s="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"] .swiper-container-vertical>.rr-swiper-wrapper{-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-moz-box-orient:vertical;-ms-flex-direction:column;-webkit-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column}

<script id="widget-template-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16" type="text/html">
<div class="retailrocket-items-container rr-swiper-container">
  <div class="retailrocket-items rr-swiper-wrapper">
    <% for (var i = 0 ; i < numberOfItems; ++i) with(items[i]) { %>
    <div class="retailrocket-item rr-swiper-slide">
	  <div class="retailrocket-item__wrapper">
          <a class="retailrocket-item__info" href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });'>
          	<div class="retailrocket-item__name">
              <span><%=Name.substr(0,33)+('...') %></span>
            </div>
            <div class="retailrocket-item__image">
              <img src="https://cdn.retailrocket.net/api/1.0/partner/<%=partnerId%>/item/<%=ItemId%>/picture/?format=png&width=<%=itemImageWidth%>&height=<%=itemImageHeight%>&scale=both" onerror="retailrocket.widget.hideProduct(this)">
        	</div>
            <div class="retailrocket-item__price-block">
              <% if (OldPrice > Price) { %>
                <div class="retailrocket-item__price with-old-price">
                  <div class="item-price"> <span class="item-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                  <div class="item-old-price"> <span class="item-old-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(OldPrice, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                </div>
              <% } else { %>
                <div class="retailrocket-item__price without-old-price">
                  <div class="item-price"> <span class="item-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, '.', ' ', 0) %>&nbsp;руб.</span></div>
                </div>
              <% } %>
            </div>
  		  </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    <% } %>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="rr-slider-arrow">
 <a class="rr-arrow swiper-prev"></a>
 <a class="rr-arrow swiper-next"></a>
</div>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function (retailrocket) {
  'use strict';

  var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
    var checkCount = 100;
    var timeout = 1000;

    (function check() {
      var result = exitCondition();
      if (result) {
        callback(result);
        return;
      }

      if (checkCount === 0) {
        if (force) {
          callback();
        }
        return;
      }

      checkCount -= 1;
      setTimeout(check, timeout);
    }());
  };
  
  if (!('duplicates' in retailrocket.modules)) {
    retailrocket.setModule('duplicates', [], function () {
      var savedIds = [];
      var paramName = 'GroupId';

      function has(id) {
        return (savedIds.indexOf(id) !== -1);
      }

      function add(id) {
        savedIds = savedIds.concat(id);
      }

      function remove(id) {
        var ids = [].concat(id);

        savedIds = savedIds.filter(function (savedId) {
          return ids.indexOf(savedId) === -1;
        });
      }

      function filter(recom) {
        if (!recom[paramName]) {
          return true;
        }

        if (!has(recom[paramName])) {
          add(recom[paramName]);
          return true;
        }

        return false;
      }

      function filteredCount(recoms) {
        return recoms.reduce(function (acc, recom) {
          return (acc + (has(recom[paramName]) ? 1 : 0));
        }, 0);
      }

      function getItems() {
        return savedIds.slice();
      }

      return {
        has: has,
        add: add,
        remove: remove,
        filter: filter,
        filteredCount: filteredCount,
        getItems: getItems,
      };
    });
  }
  
  function preRenderUpdateProducts(recoms, render) {
    var filteredRecomsWithNewPrice = [];
    var idsReco = [];
    var msgNew = {};
    var rrDataTimeZone = '2';
    var newPrices = [];

    recoms.forEach(function (recom) {
      recom.TypePrefix = recom.TypePrefix + ' ' + recom.Model;
      idsReco.push(recom.ItemId);
    });

    idsReco = idsReco.join(',');

    var rrRecomsPost = {
      rr_products: idsReco, 
      rr_zone_id: rrDataTimeZone
    }

    waitFor(
      function() {
        return ('jQuery' in window);
      },
      function() {
        $ = window.jQuery;

        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/admin/ajax/rr_check_products.php',
          data: $.param(rrRecomsPost),
          success: function (msg) {
            var parseRecoms = msg.split('|');

            parseRecoms.forEach(function (parseRecom, i) {
              var newPrice = Number(parseRecom.split(':')[1]);

              newPrices.push(newPrice);
            });

            recoms.forEach(function (recom, i) {
              recom.Price = newPrices[i];

              if (recom.Price > 0) {
                filteredRecomsWithNewPrice.push(recom);
              } 
            });

            render(filteredRecomsWithNewPrice);
          }
        });
      }
    );
  }

  retailrocket['imperiatechno5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16'] = (function () {
    var widgetParent = document.querySelector('div[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]');
    var navs = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__nav');
    var widgetWrappers = widgetParent.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-tab__content');
    var popUp = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
    var closeButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-close-button');
    var toggleButton = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup__open-button a');
    var timerWrapper = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer-block');
    var timer = widgetParent.querySelector('.rr-timer');
    
    function preRenderFnPersonal(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {        
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      } else {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forCategories(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [0],
          "popular",
          {},
          function (recommendation) {
            renderFn(recommendation.slice(0, 12));
          }
        );
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnFilter(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

      if (filteredRecoms.length > 2) {
        renderFn(filteredRecoms);
      }
    }
    
    function preRenderFnViewed(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
      if (recoms.length > 0) {
        renderFn(recoms);
      } else {
        widget.innerHTML = '<div class="rr-note">Просмотренных товаров пока нет.</div>';
      }
    }
    
    function openWidget(button) {
      var widgetBlock = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup');
      
      widgetBlock.classList.toggle('active');
      button.closest('.retailrocket-popup__open-button').classList.toggle('active');
    }
    
    function widgetTabs(evt, tabName) {
      var blockTitle = widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-popup-window__title-text');

      widgetWrappers.forEach(function (tabContentEl) {
        tabContentEl.classList.remove('active');
      });

      navs.forEach(function (nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');
      });

      widgetParent.querySelector(tabName).classList.add('active');
      evt.currentTarget.classList.add('active');
      blockTitle.innerHTML = evt.currentTarget.querySelector('.title').innerHTML;

      if (tabName == '.retailrocket-tab__content.rr-saleByPopular') {
        timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        timerWrapper.classList.remove('active');
      }
    }

    function calculateDate() {
      var dateEnd = new Date();
	  dateEnd.setHours(23,59,59);
      var dateStart = new Date();
      var hoursUtc = dateStart.getUTCHours();
      var hoursMoscow = hoursUtc + 3;
      var calculatedDate = dateEnd - dateStart;
      var hours = Math.floor(calculatedDate/1000/60/60);
      var minutes = Math.floor((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)/1000/60);
      var seconds = Math.floor(((calculatedDate-hours*60*60*1000)-minutes*60*1000)/1000);
      
      function convertTime(time){
        var digitTime = time >= 10 ? time : "0"+time.toString();
        return digitTime;
      }
      var concatedDate = convertTime(hours).toString() + ':' + convertTime(minutes).toString() + ':' + convertTime(seconds).toString();
      return concatedDate;
    }
    
    setInterval(function(){
      timer.textContent = calculateDate();
    },1000);
    

    function viewBlock(activeButton) {
      var targetWidget = activeButton.getAttribute('data-target');
      
      widgetWrappers.forEach(function(widgetWrapper) {
        if (widgetWrapper.classList.contains(targetWidget)) {
          widgetWrapper.classList.add('active');

          if (targetWidget == 'rr-saleByPopular') {
            timerWrapper.classList.add('active');
          }
        } else {
          widgetWrapper.classList.remove('active');
        }
      });
    }

    function postRenderFn(widget) {
      var showNav = 'rr-' + widget.getAttribute('data-algorithm');

      navs.forEach(function(nav) {
        nav.classList.remove('active');

        if (nav.classList.contains('rr-no-hidden') || nav.getAttribute('data-target') == showNav) {
          nav.classList.add('show');
        }
      });
      
      widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.show').classList.add('active');

      setTimeout(function() {
        viewBlock(widgetParent.querySelector('.retailrocket-tab__nav.active'));
      }, 1);

      waitFor(
        function () {
          return window.jQuery;
        },
        function ($) {
          var $widget = $(widget);

          $.getScript('https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/swiper/3.4.2/js/swiper.min.js', function () {
            var imperiatechnoSwiper = new Swiper($widget.find('.rr-swiper-container'), {
              wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
              slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
              loop: false,
              slidesPerView: 3,
              slidesPerColumn: 2,
              slidesPerColumnFill: 'column',
              slidesPerGroup: 1,
              spaceBetween: 0,
              centeredSlides: false,
              nextButton: $widget.find('.swiper-next'),
              prevButton: $widget.find('.swiper-prev'),
              paginationClickable: false,
            });
          });
        }
      );
    }
    
    function сheckMobile() {
      var check = false;

      (function(a) {
        if (/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows ce|xda|xiino/i.test(a) || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4))) check = true;
      })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);

      return check;
    };
    var widget_mode = document.querySelectorAll('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16"]')[0];

    if (сheckMobile() == true) {
		widget_mode.style.display = 'none';
    }

    closeButton.onclick = function() {
      toggleButton.click();
    };

    popUp.onmouseup = function(e) {
      if (e.target.closest('.retailrocket-popup-window') === null) {
        toggleButton.click();
      }
    };

    return {
      postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
      preRenderFnPersonal: preRenderFnPersonal,
      preRenderFnFilter: preRenderFnFilter,
      preRenderFnViewed: preRenderFnViewed,
      openWidget: openWidget,
      widgetTabs: widgetTabs
    };
  }());
  
  retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5dc93a9497a5252398a36c16');

}(retailrocket));
</script></div><!-- Rating@Mail.ru counter -->

        a.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'autocontext.begun.ru/analytics.js';
        s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(a, s);
    })(window, 'begun_analytics_params');
</script>
